name: Ally_Debuff
display_help: Allies who can return to battle have lowered damage.

name: Jab
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Punch
display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

name: Haymaker
display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Blunt Trauma can Leap to building tops without problem.

name: Panic
display_help: The Civilian is panicked by the carnage.

name: Resistance
display_help: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.

name: Lancer_Shot
display_help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegrate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Stun, Special

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Power_Thrust
display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Scorch
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Combustion
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Incinerate
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Flares
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Explosion
display_help: The Aspect of Rularuu is protected by the Willforge.

name: Summon
display_help: This high-tech device was given to you by Psimon Omega. When used on victims of Rikti experimentation it activates their latent psychic powers but causing them to fly into a blind rage and attack your nearest enemy. This device has 20 charges.

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Caster can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance. Recharge: Fast

name: TheTell
display_help: A focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Some of the Endurance you drain may transfer back to you. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: You are taking Energy Damage over Time from the Ball Lightning. Recharge: Moderate

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: The Smite attack has reduced your Accuracy.

name: Siphon_Life
display_help: The Siphon Life has weakened you, reducing your Accuracy.

name: Gloom
display_help: The Gloom is dealing Negative energy damage over time to you and reducing your Accuracy.

name: Life_Drain
display_help: Void Ripper has drained your life. Your Accuracy is reduced.
